Title: PROBLEMS
Grook:
Problems worthy
   of attack
prove their worth
   by hitting back.
Author: Piet Hein

Title: THE ROAD TO WISDOM
Grook:
The road to wisdom? -- Well, it's plain
and simple to express:
           Err
           and err
           and err again
           but less
           and less
           and less.
Author: Piet Hein

Title: WISDOM IS
Grook:
Wisdom is
the booby prize
given when you've been
unwise.
Author: Piet Hein
